Today was my last voice training lesson, and I was thinking how quickly it went by,
If you join Morning Musume。 Even if I have a hard time after joining Morning Musume。
I struggled to come out of my shell in this lesson, but in the end, I think I was able to be a little more serious and playful than in the first lesson.
I think I was able to express my feelings in all the singing lessons, but I don't think the people listening to me understood them,
I realized that my singing tone doesn't change all the time and that I often don't express myself,
I realized that I often did not express myself. I would like to exaggerate my emotions more in order to convey my feelings to others.
I would like to put my feelings out there in the final round.
